fields.description:
h3. Issue

The keyboard does not show up after focusing on a textfield. This is happening on a specific device i.e HTC Explorer (Android 2.3.5) and only with 3.0.0.GA Titanium SDK.

Here is a screencast from the customer showing the issue: http://www.screencast.com/t/TcbZoTsa (This could take some time to load)

h3. Steps to Reproduce

1. Run the sample code: http://pastie.org/private/iuuxonkphngntjalhjt82g

2. Type in the first textbox. Notice on other devices, the other textfield gains focus without dismissing the keyboard but HTC Explorer dismisses the keyboard.
fields.summary: Android: Text field not displaying keyboard on focus on HTC device

comments.body: The customer has tested this with the new 3.0.2GA SDK and that has solved the problem.

Closing as it is working as expected.
